name: Allocated Alchemy
description:
Allocated Alchemy is a Bird's Eye View puzzle game, match coloured objects together to progress through levels. 

I came up with the idea during a Game Jam last year but lacked the skills to create, It's  a side project but with love and support I might focus more on it.

If you wish to try it out, download the zip file attached and extract it, inside the folder will be a Allocated Alchemy exe. click that to play game.

Thanks In Advance,

Jyrus UnCageD


Controls: 
Right Click to move.
'E' to Pick items up (items need to be in front of player)
